name: Farm Defenders (Sr Gravatas, Igor Odi, camilanaomitm)
name_original: Farm Defenders (Sr Gravatas, Igor Odi, camilanaomitm)
description:
Have you ever watched Love, Death & Robots? Do you remember that cool episode where space rednecks fight hordes and hordes of aliens? Thats it! Nothing else to say, Rednecks, Robots, Guns and Aliens, it's everything needed for a quick fun.

Defeat horde after horde of aliens upgrading your weapons after each wave.


Controls

WASD - Movement
LMB - Main Hand
RMB - OffHand

Survive 21 waves and win the game
